Can we post more subcodes?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Laboratory: Technical Research On The Monster Rancher CD Read Process: Subcode Data Files: Monster Rancher 2 Subcode: Requests For CDs To Be Posted As Subcode: Can we post more subcodes?
By Leandra Hime on Friday, July 6, 2007 - 11:16 am:

I'm not even sure anyone reads this section anymore, but it doesn't hurt to try. I'd love to see more subcodes go up for more monsters. I'd particularly like to see Ebony, Flower Worm, Night Flyer, Dragoon, Daina, and Striker. What can I say? I have odd tastes in monsters. I'm willing to post subcodes for any monster I have that anyone wants.

By Lisa Shock on Friday, July 6, 2007 - 09:52 pm:

I guess most of us just figured people would combine to get anything not posted. I can post a few, but it's going to be a couple of days til I have the time to do it.

By alphamone on Tuesday, July 10, 2007 - 05:29 pm:

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, July 11, 2007 - 02:16 pm:

By alphamone on Wednesday, July 11, 2007 - 04:19 pm:

the subcode that makes happymask in the US version makes white hound in the PAL version.

also, boxer bajarl is made using the ergrize.(the fighting game that had ff7 characters in it, i cant remember the correct spelling offhand)

By alphamone on Wednesday, July 11, 2007 - 04:20 pm:

By John Hawley on Thursday, July 12, 2007 - 03:48 pm:

The fighting game was Ehrgeiz.

By Leandra Hime on Wednesday, July 18, 2007 - 08:50 am:

Note: Ehrgeiz only makes Boxer Bajarl in the PAL version. In the US version, it makes something else entirely (I have Ehrgeiz, I've tried it. An excellent game if you can find it!)

I know it may seem strange that I'm asking for subcodes this long after the game has been made, but I tend to play games sporadically, mostly because I'm playing so many games at once. The other reason I ask for them is because i simply don't have them! Out of the nearly 700 cds I own (yes, I counted! just shy of 700!) There are still monsters I haven't found. For instance, out of those, I have absolutely NO worms, and only two monsters with a worm sub-breed. Also, the only Gali I have is a Happy Mask! While combining to get monsters is a way to do it, I get tired of raising the same monster over and over in order to use it to combine for something I REALLY want. That being said, and after looking at the available subcodes thoroughly, my wishlist for subcodes is:

Futurity (Pixie/Metalner)
Dragoon (Centaur/Dragon)
Gidras (Dragon/Metalner)
Hound Dragon (Dragon/Tiger)
Vesuvius (Durahan/Dragon)
Genocider (Durahan/Joker)
Fanged Mask (Gali/Tiger)
Flower Worm (Worm/Plant)

And if anyone would like something that isn't posted, if I have it, I'll post it!
